SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_DBCMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_PUP_PATH_JAR#" -action &ACTION_NAME#'
! Make URL : SET &TEMP# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_PROTOCOL#, "://") : SET &TEMP# = STR_CAT(&TEMP#, &UC4RB_PUP_SERVER_NAME#) : SET &TEMP# = STR_CAT(&TEMP#, ":&UC4RB_PUP_PORT#")
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &TEMP# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_DBCMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_DBCMD#, " -baseurl &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Load package parameters : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.LOAD_PCK_PARAMETERS
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CERTIFICATE
